message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling you this great product. I think you'll really like it!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your time and effort. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm still very interested in the product, but I would like to propose a price of $145. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I can do $155, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great product and I think it's worth more than that, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
